channel.title: I need help with something
channel.description:
Hi
Recently I downloaded a client, and I was able to play until my step mom got a stupid windows essentails virus onto the computer, I mangaged to remove the virus but everytime I try to load te server it says "reqeusting title screen" then moves on to say "Connection error trying again in 5 seconds" or something like that, It never loads, and anytime I try to use the webclient it will load but it will stop when it's almost done and never connect...:l can someone help me please?

item.title: I need help with something
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Go to “My Computer” --> “C: Drive” --> There should be a folder with the server’s name, delete it and reload the client. Helped me at least

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with something
item.dc:creator: @Majunior Majunior
item.description:
@Majunior wrote:

Thank’s. I was told the server is down now.
But any other clients I try to use it does the same thing…is there no solution besides beign shit out of luck?

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with something
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Erm… Looks like the cache is gone, or the place where the client grabs the cache from is having some issues.

Idk, try waiting a while.

Read full topic
